title: Plastic Pipe and Fittings - Past Present and Future
description:
Plastic Pipe and Fittings - Past Present and Future - Thomas S. Walsh (ASTM International, 2011).pdf

ISBN 9780803175143

Historical Reviewsâ€”an overview of the PVC piping industry and polyethylene corrugated pipe industry in North America; development of ASTMâ€™s Standard Specification D3350 Polyethylene Plastics Pipe and Fittings Materials and its influence on polyethylene piping compounds, and much more.
Designâ€”service life analysis for corrugated high density polyethylene piping for drainage applications; designing storm water chambers to meet AASHTO specifications; design and performance of plastic drainage pipes, and more.

Testing and Failure Analysisâ€”stress cracking test method for corrugated high density polyethylene piping; qualification test method for high density polyethylene butt fusion joining; tensile testing of restrained joint PVC pipes; and failure analysis of plastic pipe and other hydraulic structures.

New Materials and Applicationsâ€”discussions on Polyamide 11and Polyamide 12; and use of plastic tubing to replace cast iron piping in steam heating applications.

Installationâ€”plastic pipes for trenchless applications; trenchless case history; calibration case study of installation loads on fusible PVC piping in directional drilling; and axial response of HDPE pipes in directional drilling installations
